turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. I need you to put in an order for pizza at Maialina, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The location on Main Street?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's the one!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many pizzas do you need?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I better go with three. I don't want to run out on Pizza Night.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you know which pizzas you would like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I know one needs to be a Margherita for the picky eaters.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One Margherita, got it. And what next?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmm.... I recall there being one with pesto on it. Is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, there is a Pesto pizza. However, it has caramelized onions on it. I know those aren't your favorite. Would you like me to request no onions?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Definitely! Thank you for remembering.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. One Pesto with no onions. And for the third?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's do the Parma. And ask for extra arugula, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Are each of those pizzas $12?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Only the Margherita.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How much are the others?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They are each $16.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That works. Want to read the order back to me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One Margherita, one Pesto without the onions, and one Param with extra arugula.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds perfect. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have submitted the order for you. The pizzas should be ready for pick up in $25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Excellent. I will stop on my way home from work.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The receipt should be arriving via text at any moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much. Good night!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good night.
